metadata.synopsis: The player just stole a relic from a crypt in an abandoned chapel, and all candles around it sputtered out. Sounds of movement come from another room... Shadowheart is with the party

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Hells... something just woke up down here.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: Let them come. The darkness can be to our advantage.
